original_text: But on the morrow all the congregation of the children of Israel murmured against Moses and against Aaron, saying, Ye have killed the people of the Lord.
korean_text: 이튿날 이스라엘 자손의 온 회중이 모세와 아론을 원망하여 이르되 너희가 여호와의 백성을 죽였도다 하고

sentences.original_text: all the congregation of the children of Israel
murmured against Moses and against Aaron
Ye have killed the people of the Lord
